title: Amazon API Gateway HTTP API to Amazon EventBridge
description: Create an Amazon API Gateway HTTP API connected to Amazon EventBridge.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The CDK project creates an Amazon API gateway HTTP API endpoint. The endpoint uses service integrations to directly connect to Amazon EventBridge. An EventBridge rule sends all events to Cloudwatch Logs.
